name: sondbound
description: SÖNDBÖUND editor inside VS Code (Webview wrapper around the built-in audio editor).

sondbound.pythonPath.description: Optional override for Python executable used by the backend. If empty, uses SOUNDGEN_PYTHON env var, then .venv, then 'python' on PATH.

sondbound.defaultEngine.description: Default generation engine (used when commands are called without an explicit engine).

sondbound.defaultSeconds.description: Default sound duration in seconds (used when seconds are not provided).

sondbound.defaultPost.description: Whether to apply post-processing by default.

sondbound.defaultOutputSubdir.description: Default subfolder (relative to workspace root) for generated WAV output when no explicit outputPath is provided.

sondbound.webUiHost.description: Host/interface to bind the local web UI to. Use 127.0.0.1 for local-only.

sondbound.webUiPort.description: Port for the local web UI (Gradio).

sondbound.webUiMode.description: Which web UI to launch. 'control-panel' is the modern UI; 'legacy' is the older accordion-style UI.

sondbound.webUiEmbed.description: How to embed the local Web UI in the VS Code Webview. 'proxy' runs a local reverse proxy that strips frame-blocking headers and tunnels websockets (most reliable). 'direct' iframes the Gradio server URL directly.

sondbound.webUiProxyPort.description: Port for the local reverse proxy used when webUiEmbed=proxy. Use 0 to auto-pick a free port.
